## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's code style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed any debug logging or commented-out code

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added docstrings to new functions/classes (Python)
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments to new functions/components (TypeScript)

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested the changes in a development environment
- [ ] I have tested edge cases and error scenarios

### Commits
- [ ] My commits follow the Conventional Commits format
- [ ] Each commit is atomic and has a clear purpose
- [ ] I have rebased/squashed commits for a clean history (if needed)

### Breaking Changes
- [ ] This PR introduces no breaking changes
- [ ] OR: I have documented breaking changes in CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] OR: I have updated migration guides for breaking changes
